subject: Basketball (College)
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: A judge threw out a defamation lawsuit by two men who said Syracuse Coach Jim Boeheim slandered them when he said their accusations of sexual abuse against Bernie Fine were driven by greed.
snippet: A judge threw out a defamation lawsuit by two men who said Syracuse Coach Jim Boeheim slandered them when he said their accusations of sexual abuse against Bernie Fine were driven by greed.
